page.title: 07Housing.
page.content: Apart from the one small estate of houses and bungalows,the only other dwellings are farmhouses. These tend to be scattered over the block as a whole and number seven in total. Some of these have "tied" cottages attached i.e.dwellings provided for farm workers.These were provided rent-free or a nominal rent charged which would be deducted from the farm labourer's wages. The small estate next to the school is a mixture of detached and semi-detached houses and bungalows, all of which are owner-occupied. One of the detached bungalows has its own open-air swimming pool, and some of the bungalows front on to the yacht basin and have their own moorings.
